promptPrefix:
[PROMPT] Draft a legal notice on behalf of "Your Client's Name" (you can use a fictional name for the client) to the relevant party (you can choose a fictional party name), addressing a specific legal dispute or issue. Ensure that the notice complies with the legal requirements and practices in India. The notice should be well-structured, clear, and persuasive, stating the facts, legal claims, and any necessary remedies sought.

Please make sure to include all necessary elements required in a legal notice, such as the correct parties' names and addresses, precise legal references, and a concise yet comprehensive summary of the situation at hand. [PROMPT]
[TARGETLANGUAGE] English [TARGETLANGUAGE]
title: Legal Notice in India
